short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an option to 'View image' to the right click context menu on an image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an option to 'View image' to the right click context menu on an image. This will replace the current web page with just the image in its original size.
